title: bugsplatmadness
body: i got afk games 5 from 20 min because of the freaking bugsplay madnes i got 10 times in row bugsplat sht and because of that i got 5 punished games please fix that please i  just got my account back it was hacked i played 1 freaking game and bug splat fucked my mood and game up please fix that

replies.body: If Bugsplat is occurring at such a high rate, it might be a good time to stop queueing up matchmade games for now.  This error can be caused by outdated drivers or hardware, but the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help get that fixed up.  Run through each step in a custom game for the fix until you're absolutely sure you're able to queue back up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
